replies.body: Prep yourself since twisted is going down, they'll all come from there to aram
Sush! Before they give up trying to fix Aram like they did with TT
Since riot keeps "permabanning" people as if this does anything but put them on another account, these soon-to-be $8 accounts will soon be all there is in ABAM mode.

Once you get a few wins/level up, you won't see bots in ARAM. I have low-high lvl accounts and can't remember the last date I saw them. I mean, first aram or two, got bots.. Stomped hard and started getting matched up/against good people and never saw a bot again.
Tbh it made me a bit sad how quickly the bots went away.. Enemy team full of bots was a super easy chest/s

I have never seen a bot in ARAM. 

Absorb their strength and grow, escape your ELO.
